title: Upcoming Winter Weather
lede: As you prepare to celebrate, we hope you are also ready for a change in our upcoming weather pattern.

sections.copy:
Temperatures will be very cold Sunday through next week. Highs in the 20s for most locations, with morning temperatures in the teens to single digits across the area. The coldest temperatures will be Monday through Thursday.

There is a likely chance for snow, beginning Christmas Day through Sunday night. Amounts are generally showing possible accumulation in 1-4" for most areas of Western Washington.

Be ready, stay warm and be safe.

Remember - In ANY emergency call 911.

We are ready and our holiday hours will be our usual hours of service to you - we respond 24 hours a day, seven days of week, 365 days a year, in all weather and for all emergencies. See less
